instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00164 water damage no charging.
threads.message:
clean everything, all look good, no green/orange light, replace I/O board and cable(dont know 100% if they good) the mac turn on with and without battery, there is charging sign but the battery percent's not go up.
PP3V42_G3H 3.4v
ONEWIRE 1.4V 
ACOK 3.3V

threads.title: 820-00164 water damage no charging.
threads.message:
"ONEWIRE 1.4V"
Not good, inspect LIO connector for corrosion.
Check continuity for SYS_ONEWIRE line between MLB and LIO boards; when flex is connected.
